F5 And Hashicorp Basics Source |

Version notice:

F5 Automation With TerraformÂ¶

This class covers the following topics:

  • How to use Terraform and DO to automate BIG-IP infrastructure onboarding
  • How to use Terraform and AS3 to automate BIG-IP configuration changes
  • Incorporate security automation to eliminate friction and security/infrastructure bottlenecks

Expected time to complete: 1.5 hours

Note

All work for this lab will be performed exclusively from the Client Server. No installation or interaction with your local system is required.

  • Basic BIG-IP Administration with Terraform
  • Declarative BIG-IP Administration with AS3
  • Use Terraform and AS3 to enable DevSecOps
